Articles.Content: Hi!, I enjoy science, and specially space science. That has led me to play KSP and now, I'm starting getting involved in its great community. Good luck in your endevours to everyone and enjoy the flight!

Hello there!

I've been enjoying the flight for more than a year, and it just keeps getting better.

Just you wait until the next update hits the shelves.
Welcome to the forums! If you have any questions about the game you want answered, or any cool stories or craft screenshots you want to share, feel free.
